EmailTemplate.description: Removed Email of a customer reference.
EmailTemplate.name: Reference Program: Removed
EmailTemplate.subject: Removed Reference: {!Contact.Name} at {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name} has been removed as a reference on the {!Account.Name} account record. Please forward this email to CSMOps@intapp.com with any questions you have on this removal.
{!Reference_Event__c.Link}
